name: Neon Runner (aablanco01)
description:
Neon Runner is a first person platformer, where you run, jump, dash, and climb your way to the end to avoid being caught in the red box! This was a submission for the Extra Credit's Game Jam. This is my first game I've officially built with the Unreal Engine, I'm very much charmed by its features and hope to create more projects using the engine!

Playing is simple: 
WASD is to move, use the mouse to control the camera, Space to jump, and Left Shift to Dash.
